title: Without A Trace
description: In this final chapter, Trace is locked away, accused of murder and the victim of treachery. After Shy’s forbidden relationship with Marla and her disloyalty that threatens to tear their family apart, Trace is in for the fight of his life and struggles to find freedom and forgiveness. The rest of the group – Beauty, Led, Luke and Shy - are trying to survive without him, but face death at every turn. Teetering on the brink of destruction, they face Marla, who has teamed up with Victoria, across a suspenseful battleground of revenge and betrayal. Scores will be settled, and Trace and this group of friends will discover what the end of their world looks like. Without a Trace is the thrilling conclusion to Lashone Vs. Shaneek’s epic trilogy of seduction, deception, and murder.
author: Lashone Vs Shaneek
